Module com.example.main
Package com.example.main

Class MainMenuViewByMonthController

java.lang.Object
com.example.main.MainMenuViewByMonthController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainMenuViewByMonthController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the Main Menu View By Month page.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    javafx.scene.control.TableView<Appointment> tableviewMainMenuTable
    This variable holds the table view that will represent the appointment data and it's columns on the main page.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MainMenuViewByMonthController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addAppointmentButtonClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    This function is linked to a button, and when the button is pressed will take the user to the AddAppointment form.
    void deleteAppointmentButtonClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    This function is linked to a button, and when the button is will delete the currently selected appointment.
    void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    This method sets up the two tables on the mainForm page.
    void logoutButtonClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    This function is linked to a button, and when the button is pressed will take the user to the Login form.
    void modifyAppointmentButtonClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    This function is linked to a button, and when the button is pressed will take the user to the ModifyAppointment form with all the data passed through it from the selected appointment to be modified.
    void monthSelect​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    This function will read what month the user wants to use to filter the table view, and it will return the new table on the screen.
    void reportsButtonClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    This function is linked to a button, and when the button is pressed will take the user to the ReportsContactSchedule form.
    void viewAllButtonClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    This function is linked to a button, and when the button is pressed will take the user to the MainMenuViewAll form.
    void viewByMonthButtonClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    This function is linked to a button, and when the button is pressed will take the user to the MainMenuViewMonth form.
    void viewByWeekButtonClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    This function is linked to a button, and when the button is pressed will take the user to the MainMenuViewWeek form.
    void viewCustomersButtonClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    This function is linked to a button, and when the button is pressed will take the user to the MainMenuViewCustomers form.

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method sets up the two tables on the mainForm page. On initialization the method will set up the Part table and Product table. It will also handle the resource bundle that controls the language settings.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
